title: We won’t get fooled again (we hope)
description: When I first met Gerry Lenfest, a pragmatic but visionary cable TV entrepreneur, I had to remind myself that this soft-spoken 85-year-old had helped usher in two of the great disruptions in the history of news and media: the advent of multi-channel television and ubiquitous broadband access to American homes. The Lenfest Institute for Journalism...
